overview: Bringing his genius and passion to the podium, conductor Václav Neumann leads the Czech Philharmonic Chorus and Orchestra in this 1989 staging of composer Antonín DvoYák's Stabat Mater. Based on a medieval Latin hymn about the Virgin Mary's suffering at the foot of her son's cross, the production features stellar vocal performances by soprano Yvonne Kenny, mezzo-soprano Eva Randová, tenor Wieslav Ochman and bass Jan Galla.
title: Václav Neumann: Stabat Mater
